title: Mario Gruppioni
text:
Mario Gruppioni (13 September 1901 – 19 January 1939) was an Italian <a href="wrestling">wrestler</a> and Olympic medalist in <a href="Greco-Roman%20wrestling">Greco-Roman wrestling</a>.
Olympics.
Gruppioni competed at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Los%20Angeles">Los Angeles</a> where he received a bronze medal in <a href="Greco-Roman%20wrestling">Greco-Roman wrestling</a>, the "light heavyweight" class.
